text: Are katan riꞌ, chiya bꞌe kekꞌiy loq kikobꞌchal. Are kuriq ri qꞌotaj rech yakoj, kꞌa che riꞌ keqilo jachin chike ri itzel qꞌayes xuqujeꞌ jachin chike ri tiriko. Keꞌntaq na bꞌik ajchakibꞌ riꞌ rech nabꞌe kakibꞌoq ri itzel qꞌayes, kakimulij, kꞌa te riꞌ kakiporoj. Xuqujeꞌ kakikꞌam bꞌik ri tiriko, keꞌkiya kanoq pa ri nukꞌolibꞌal.
